channel.title: C2S: Client to Server Interactions
channel.description:
> This protocol permits a client to act *on behalf* of a user. E.g., a mobile app to interact with a social stream of the user's actor.
## Client to Server Interactions
This category covers [Client to Server Interactions](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#client-to-server-interactions) of the specification.
* [6.1 Client Addressing](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#client-addressing) * [6.2 Create Activity](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#create-activity-outbox) 1. [6.2.1 Object creation without a Create Activity](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#object-without-create) * [6.3 Update Activity](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#update-activity-outbox) 1. [6.3.1 Partial Updates](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#partial-updates) * [6.4 Delete Activity](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#delete-activity-outbox) * [6.5 Follow Activity](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#follow-activity-outbox) * [6.6 Add Activity](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#add-activity-outbox) * [6.7 Remove Activity](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#remove-activity-outbox) * [6.8 Like Activity](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#like-activity-outbox) * [6.9 Block Activity](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#block-activity-outbox) * [6.10 Undo Activity](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#undo-activity-outbox) * [6.11 Delivery](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#client-to-server-outbox-delivery) * [6.12 Uploading Media](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/#uploading-media)
